programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder in Paris' Louvre Museum and cryptic clues in some of Leonardo da Vinci's most famous paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery. For 2,000 years a secret society closely guards information that -- should it come to light -- could rock the very foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean is a man of action. Less than 24 hours into his parole from a New Jersey penitentiary, the wry, charismatic thief is already rolling out his next plan. He follows three rules: do not hurt anybody, do not steal from anyone who does not deserve it, and play the game like you have got nothing to lose. With those in mind, Danny works to orchestrate the most sophisticated, elaborate casino heist in history, targeting three establishments owned by the man who is dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: A mother leans on her horn at the wrong time, to the wrong guy. Road rage doesn't begin to describe what he's about to do to her and everyone she knows.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean is a man of action. Less than 24 hours into his parole from a New Jersey penitentiary, the wry, charismatic thief is already rolling out his next plan. He follows three rules: do not hurt anybody, do not steal from anyone who does not deserve it, and play the game like you have got nothing to lose. With those in mind, Danny works to orchestrate the most sophisticated, elaborate casino heist in history, targeting three establishments owned by the man who is dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: After pulling off their Las Vegas casino heist, Danny Ocean incurs the wrath of Terry Benedict, who wants his money back with interest. Lacking the cash to meet his two-week deadline, the crew of thieves must plan an elaborate robbery in Europe, or their lives will be forfeit. While they have Danny's wife on their side, they face a new challenge in the form of the mysterious 'Night Fox', who seems to be the better thief.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoner's psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: After pulling off their Las Vegas casino heist, Danny Ocean incurs the wrath of Terry Benedict, who wants his money back with interest. Lacking the cash to meet his two-week deadline, the crew of thieves must plan an elaborate robbery in Europe, or their lives will be forfeit. While they have Danny's wife on their side, they face a new challenge in the form of the mysterious 'Night Fox', who seems to be the better thief.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: Louis Bloom finds himself falling head first in to the shady world of crime journalism. He quickly develops a taste for the profession and discovers that he has got both the business acumen and a strong enough stomach to fend off his rivals.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plans to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: Chen Yutong, a girl's middle school student, was bullied at school, but her mother Li Han was unable to save her daughter from the "hell." Everyone around her turned a blind eye, and a collective silence brewed greater violence.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: Louis Bloom finds himself falling head first in to the shady world of crime journalism. He quickly develops a taste for the profession and discovers that he has got both the business acumen and a strong enough stomach to fend off his rivals.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plans to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise they're at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E' and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen

programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: The Charm of Love
programme.desc: Art historian Madison “Maddie” TURNER, an expert in ancient artifacts and in deflecting unwanted male attention, travels halfway around the world to the Caribbeans in order to find the legendary "Lovers Stone".

programme.title: Vita & Virginia
programme.desc: It's the fascinating true story about the love affair between socialite and popular author Vita Sackville-West and literary icon Virginia Woolf, and the love story that inspired Virginia Woolf's Orlando. Starring Gemma Arterton, Elizabeth Debicki and Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Once upon a time, screenwriter Keith Michaels was on top of the world. But now, he's divorced, broke and hasn't written a hit film in years. His attitude slowly begins to turn when he meets Holly, a single mum.

programme.title: Love, Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since age six. As they dream of travelling the world, they decide to leave their small British town for Boston together to attend university. But fate has other plans...

programme.title: Almost Love
programme.desc: Adam and Marklin's 5-year relationship has gone from a passionate flame to a simmer, forcing them to reconcile with each other's shortcomings while their friends endlessly search for love in New York City.

programme.title: As I Am
programme.desc: One week of school remains for Kai, an aspiring writer, and his friends. How they spend this time will cost one of them their life and leave them changed forever.

programme.title: Smart People
programme.desc: A widowed professor (Dennis Quaid) experiences a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: The perfect world of a beautiful Seattle television reporter is shattered by the prediction of her death in seven days.

programme.title: Love at Sunset Terrace
programme.desc: Tired of her fast-paced life in the city, Sophie Carter travels to a small seaside town to disconnect and self-reflect, staying at an Airbnb run by a widowed father of a young girl.

programme.title: Salt and fire
programme.desc: A scientist blames the head of a large company for an ecological disaster in South America. But when a volcano begins to show signs of erupting, they must unite to avoid a disaster.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: Josephine Chesterfield (Anne Hathaway) is a glamorous, seductive Brit with a penchant for defrauding gullible wealthy men. Into her well-ordered world bursts Penny Rust (Rebel Wilson), an Aussie who is as free-form and fun-loving as Josephine is calculated and cunning.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is literally money and aging stops at 25, the only way to stay alive is to earn, steal, or inherit more time.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: The epic adventures of a man who discovers that he possesses the exhilarating ability to instantly teleport anywhere in the world he can imagine.

programme.title: Five Nights in Maine
programme.desc: A man, reeling from the tragic loss of his wife, travels to rural Maine to seek answers from his estranged mother-in-law, who is herself confronting grief. With David Oyelowo and Dianne Wiest.

programme.title: Where hands touch
programme.desc: In 1944, a 15-year-old girl, daughter of a white German mother and a black African father, meets a member of the Hitler Youth. They become bound by the realization of the horrors being committed around them.

programme.title: Foster Boy
programme.desc: A for-profit Foster care agency puts a known sex offender into the same foster home as a lawyer's young client, Jamal, with catastrophic results.

programme.title: Into The Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Free-spirited scuba divers Sebastion and Dani run a modest diving company in Hawaii. The young couple is delighted when they're hired by mysterious jet-setters who are searching for sunken treasure and will pay big money for diving help.

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Armand and Albert have built the perfect life for themselves tending to their Miami nightclub. But their pastel tranquility is shaken when Armand's son announces that he's getting married to the daughter of ultra-conservative Senator Keeley... and they're all getting together for dinner!

programme.title: Waiting for Anya
programme.desc: From the mind of world-renowned author Michael Morpurgo comes the cinematic adaptation of Waiting for Anya - a powerful and authentic true story of a young shepherd that had a key part to play in one of the world's most shocking moments in history.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Two strangers who drunkenly got married in Vegas fight over a huge jackpot after having their annulment denied by a judge.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: It was a stroke of genius, but now the perfect crime is turning into a perfect disaster.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig stars as Imogene, once a promising young New York playwright whose promise has fizzled, thanks to a crisis of confidence. Heavily in denial about being dumped by her society boyfriend, Imogene uses her skill for drama to stage an elaborate fake suicide as an appeal for his sympathy.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: FBI agent Malcolm Turner is known best for being a brilliant, master of disguise. Malcolm's latest assignment sends him to small-town Georgia, where he's assigned to trap a brutal bank robber who the FBI suspects will be coming down to visit his ex-girlfriend Sherry and her son.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Ray is a fussy nine-year-old girl whose last nanny just ran out. When Ray's way-too-busy mom hires Molly to be Ray's new nanny, it's the perfect setup for both girls to change their ways and discover that sometimes your best friend can come in the form that you least expect!

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Undercover Agent Malcolm Turner is back and this time he's out to expose the suspected designer of a deadly computer "worm" that would allow outside forces access to sophistical and critical government intelligence files.

programme.title: Killing Gunther
programme.desc: A dysfunctional team of young assassins set out to make a name for themselves by killing the most notorious hitman of all time, Gunther (Arnold Schwarzenegger).

programme.title: Are You Here
programme.desc: When Steve Dallas hears that his friend Ben Baker has lost his estranged father, the two return to Ben's childhood home to discover Ben has inherited the family fortune.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When Chef Carl Casper suddenly quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant, he is left to figure out what's next. Finding himself in Miami, he teams up with his ex-wife, his friend and his son to launch a food truck.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son

programme.title: Pink String and Sealing Wax
programme.desc: In 1890's Brighton, the young son of a puritanical chemist longs to escape the repressive environment of his family life and the overbearing restraints of his cruel, pious father. Eventually finding refuge in a local tavern, he is immediately attracted to the sordid glamour of the drinking classes and the gritty world that they inhabit. He also finds himself becoming infatuated with the tavern's landlady, which will inadvertently lead to him being drawn into a plot to kill her abusive husband. Directed by Robert Hamer (Kind Hearts and Coronets, School For Scoundrels), Pink String and Sealing Wax stars Googie Withers (The Lady Vanishes), Mervyn Johns (Dead of Night) and Gordon Jackson (Whisky Galore! / The Quatermass Experiment) in a film that cleverly entwines the dynamics of a thriller with biting social commentary and a multi-layered plot structure that contrasts the parallels of the British class system.

programme.title: DAYBREAK
programme.desc: Eddie is a man with a secret - his second job is that of public hangman. When he falls into the canal following a fight with a youth over his wife, his body is not found. A thriller with unexpected twists.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Live
programme.desc: Expanding on NFL Network's "GameDay" programming on Sundays during football season, "GameDay Live" updates viewers on what's happening throughout the league. Beginning with kickoff of early-afternoon events and continuing throughout late-afternoon contests, the studio show offers nearly immediate highlights of scoring and other notable plays. But the program is about more than the action; it intersperses highlights of press conferences, interviews with players and coaches, and live reports by announcers at game sites.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: Hellboy

Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Doc's violent, bank-robbing cronies, including Buddy, Bats and Darling, get in and out of Dodge before it's too late. He's not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick O'Connell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator races to save the woman he loves before the city collapses.

programme.desc: From `Dirty Harry' and `The Godfather' to the deeply imperfect gang from the `Fast and the Furious' franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army, but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during America's military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlord's two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Shooter

As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Final Verdict
programme.desc: (2009) Thriller with Erica Durance. When a murder conviction is overturned, those involved in the original trial start turning up dead. Now, the DA who prosecuted the case finds herself under threat.

programme.title: Flirting with Danger
programme.desc: (2006) Heart-pounding thriller with Charisma Carpenter. While investigating the sudden death of his best friend, a lawyer finds himself in love and in danger when he is seduced by a mysterious woman.

programme.title: Lies and Deception
programme.desc: (2005) Thriller with Twin Peaks star Mädchen Amick. A private investigator helps a women discover the truth about her husband's apparent suicide.

programme.title: Snatched from Mommy
programme.desc: (2021) Heart-wrenching psychological thriller starring Chelsea Hobbs. When blogger Elizabeth's baby is kidnapped, she uncovers a betrayal that hits much closer to home than she realised.

programme.title: Saving My Daughter
programme.desc: (2021) Suspenseful thriller starring Alicia Leigh Willis. A mother confronts her darkest fears when her daughter mysteriously disappears again, fifteen years after surviving a previous abduction.

programme.title: Garage Sale Mystery: The Wedding Dress
programme.desc: (2015) Murder mystery with Lori Loughlin. When she finds a bloodstained wedding dress with a strange backstory, second-hand sleuth Jennifer must lift the veil on a decades-old crime.

programme.title: Garage Sale Mysteries: Guilty Until Proven Innocent
programme.desc: (2016) Quirky detective drama with Lori Loughlin. An antiques expert with a knack for sleuthing investigates a murder case when her friend is accused of killing her fiancé.

programme.title: Match Point
programme.desc: (2005) Psychological thriller with Scarlett Johansson. A former tennis pro falls for a girl who is dating his wealthy friend and future brother-in-law. Can he avoid temptation?

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer
programme.desc: (2017) High-octane thriller starring Sam Worthington. An assassin hired to kill a young woman ends up falling for her instead. Together, they team up to avenge her father's death.

programme.title: Jack Hunter And The Star Of Heaven
programme.desc: (2008) Action starring Ivan Sergei. When archaeologist Jack Hunter's mentor is killed, he must find the culprit and stop ancient treasure falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Hidden Truth
programme.desc: (2016) Intense thriller with Sarah Lind. After her brother is accused of murder, Jamie tries to clear his name, uncovering dark secrets and a killer who will do anything to get away with it...

programme.title: Killing Salazar
programme.desc: Six U.S. agents have to protect a key witness in a major drug case from being murdered by the drug dealers he is going to testify against. Starring Luke Goss and Steven Seagal (2016).

programme.title: Fatal Flatline
programme.desc: (2020) Thriller starring Julie McNiven. A grieving couple donates their dead daughter's organs. But the recipient of her heart exhibits a disturbing and sinister obsession.

programme.title: The People's Vet
programme.desc: Meet the dedicated teams of vets and nurses who provide the essential care and treatment needed by their furry patients at two of the UK's busiest Charity pet hospitals.

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a detached property in Liverpool, a maisonette in London and a terraced house in Staffordshire. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a wooden house in Polperro, a developer in the Midlands and a flat in Shropshire. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a detached house in Sittingbourne in Kent, an old care home in Cumbrian and a two bedroomed flat in London. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a terraced house in Shildon, County Durham, a terraced property in Burslem, Stoke-on-Trent and a mid terraced building in Streatham.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Devon, a semi-detached house in Derbyshire and a 2 bedroomed flat in Streatham, London. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a commercial property in Battersea, a 3 bedroomed end terrace house in County Durham and a development opportunity in South Wales.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a 3 bedroom detached property in Chatham in Kent, a terraced house in Blythe and a Georgian semi-detached house in Camberwell.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a charming cottage in Stockton-on-Tees, a semi-detached house in Bexleyheath, Kent and a commercial unit in Dartmouth, Devon.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: A terraced house in Burnley in Lancashire, a bungalow on a big plot in Paddock Wood in Kent and a semi in Chaddesden in Derby all go under the hammer.

programme.title: The Bignose Dilemma
programme.desc: Vanity dislikes having the same blue nose as any other Smurf. What he needs is something special... Bignose, Bigmouth's fiancée, also wants to change her nose. And so, by the way, does Gargamel. Some nose exchanging takes place...

programme.title: The Colour Smurf
programme.desc: Spectra is the Colour Fairy, the one whose wheel of colours make all the blues, reds, yellows and greens of the world. She is a friend of Painter Smurf, so when he takes the Smurflings to her home in her absence, the Smurflings fool around with the Colour Wheel... and all the colours disappear from the Earth. What's worse, without colours the Colour Fairy cannot live...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfstone Quest: In the distant valley of Nodrog, the Smurfs meet the Molians who try to dissuade them from obtaining the magical Smurf-stone that Papa Smurf needs to cure his gout.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Grouchy Makes A Splash: We all know Grouchy Smurf hates a lot of things. But one thing he hates more than anything else is water, when there is enough of it to drown in. You see, Grouchy can't swim. And when the Smurfs notice this peculiarity and try to teach him how to survive in water, the evil wizard Gargamel makes things a little more dangerous than they ought to be....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hefty's Heart: Gargamel infects Hefty's heart with hate and then uses the little Smurf as a decoy for the others. Fortunately, Hefty's love overcomes his hate and he helps his little friends escape from Gargamel's clutches.

programme.title: Jokey's Joke Book
programme.desc: Jokey Smurf's joke boxes are no longer funny to the other Smurfs. Jokey finds new ideas in his Great Joke Book, but these ideas are even less popular in the Village. And here comes the evil Gargamel with a few jokes of his own...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Three Smurfketeers: In another Smurf theatrical super-production based – very loosely – on Alexandre Dumas' characters, a masterpiece of the stage is created, with a few lines from Romeo and Juliet thrown in.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Royal Drum: No one believes Grandpa Smurf when he tells of far-away jungles and savannahs teeming with wild giant cats, striped horses, long-necked leaf-eaters and strange tribes... Only some Smurflings give some credit to his tales. But when Grandpa Smurf hears the sound of the magic Royal Drum in the forest, the one that can tame wild beasts, he sets out to prove that he's not an old addle-brained storyteller.

programme.title: Spelunking Smurfs
programme.desc: The starving Smurfs discover a cave that has a stash of frozen food inside guarded by an equally frozen troll who was imprisoned because of his greed by a magic diamond. As the Smurfs defrost the cave, Gargamel steals the food, but the magic diamond transforms him into an icy mass and the freed troll happily helps the Smurfs carry the food back to their village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Magnifying Mixture: Brainy makes an enlarging potion that turns Hefty into human size. The big-little strong man captures Gargamel and brings him back to the Smurf Village where Papa Smurf magically causes Azrael to chase his master back to his dreary castle.

programme.title: The Smurfomatic Smurfolator
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel still wants to destroy the Smurfs. This time, he sends on the forest the seeds of a creeping weed that is sure to entangle all the Smurfs… But Handy Smurf has devised a smurfomatic smurfolator...

programme.title: The Kaplowey Scroll
programme.desc: There is a terrifying magic word. When you direct the word at something or someone, you make it vanish into nothingness! Can the Smurfs undo its evil power before Gargamel gets hold of it?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tattle-Tail Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's had enough. The Smurflings and Sassette keep on telling tales about him with unpleasant results. He therefore concocts a magic formula, taken from Papa Smurf's books of spells, which makes the little Smurfs' tails grow longer and longer every time they tell tales. What he hasn't counted on is that Gargamel now has a way of catching the Smurflings.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Pussywillow Pixies: Clumsy Smurf's misadventures take him across a river into Pussywillow Hollow. There he meets the Pixies – charming and shapely beings whose enemies, the Wartmongers, will meet the Smurfs in some unforeseen ways.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Nightmare: Every time Lazy falls asleep, he is caught in the same recurrent nightmare: he is in the power of Morphio, an evil sorcerer who wants to capture as many sleeping souls as possible. One after another, all the Smurfs are going to fall in Morphio's clutches. All of them? Well, maybe not, if Papa Smurf can help it. And Papa Smurf goes to the Sandman for help...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Puppy: Homnibus gives the Smurfs a dog that they name Puppy. The playful, normal-sized animal likes his new home, but Balthazar captures him, thinking that the Smurfs' magical secrets are in Puppy's collar. The Smurfs rescue the dog and Baby finds only music in the collar's locket.

programme.title: Reckless Smurfs
programme.desc: This time, Gargamel's plan cannot fail. Undeterred by Azrael's derisive cackling, the evil wizard perfects a magic substance called Daredevil Dust, which is going to change all the Smurfs into rash, incautious swashbucklers. Will Papa Smurf fall into Gargamel's trap? Will their enemy catch all the Smurfs? Will this story have a happy ending?

programme.title: Monster Smurfs
programme.desc: This is spook-a-Smurf eve, and all the Smurfs get ready for the fancy dress party… But Brainy Smurf gets hold of Papa Smurf's Book of Magic, and all the Smurfs are changed into hideous but funny creatures. Yet danger lurks...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Now You Smurf 'Em, Now You Don't: The underground trolls who want them to be their slaves capture the Smurfs. Papa Smurf ingeniously frees them and then destroys the trolls' magic crystal ball that gives them power over the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfic Games: The Smurfs discover the spirit and joy of friendly competition when they hold their first "Smurfic Games". After a near miss with the troublesome cat Azrael, the Smurfs decide they need to get into better shape. Papa Smurf suggests that the Smurfs tone their bodies as well as sharpen their athletic abilities by inaugurating the "Smurfic Games".

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All The Smurf's A Stage: Poet Smurf's new play is going to be his greatest work ever, and it will feature the most favourite Smurf of all: Smurfette in the leading female role. All the other Smurfs vie for the honour of playing opposite Smurfette. Even Timid Smurf, who is the shy and retiring type, is a candidate for the part. Brainy Smurf, self-appointed manager of the play, does not see it that way...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - For The Love Of Gargamel: Trying a new spell on the Smurfs backfires when Gargamel turns himself into stone. The Smurfs are delirious with joy. Their archenemy will make them suffer no more!

programme.title: The Horn Of Plenty
programme.desc: Mother Nature always does her best, but this time she's gone wrong. Her wand gets the wrong results and she accidentally damages the Autumn harvest. Now the Smurfs and all the forest animals face a lean and hungry winter. The only place where the Smurfs could get food would be the Land of Plenty. But Gargamel steals the famed Horn of Plenty to lure the Smurfs.

programme.title: Spelunking Smurfs
programme.desc: The starving Smurfs discover a cave that has a stash of frozen food inside guarded by an equally frozen troll who was imprisoned because of his greed by a magic diamond. As the Smurfs defrost the cave, Gargamel steals the food, but the magic diamond transforms him into an icy mass and the freed troll happily helps the Smurfs carry the food back to their village.

programme.title: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Once a year, Greedy Smurf makes a special batch of Smurfberry candy. Every Smurf receives a whole year's provision of the smurfiest candy in the whole world. But can a Smurf keep his provision for a whole year? Can the Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tattle-Tail Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's had enough. The Smurflings and Sassette keep on telling tales about him with unpleasant results. He therefore concocts a magic formula, taken from Papa Smurf's books of spells, which makes the little Smurfs' tails grow longer and longer every time they tell tales. What he hasn't counted on is that Gargamel now has a way of catching the Smurflings.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Waste Not, Smurf Not: Growing, harvesting and preparing food takes up much of the Smurfs' time. Handy invents a machine that farms and processes food. But this wonderful invention has its drawbacks...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Last Spell: Papa Smurf has been elected Wizard of the Year, and the evil wizard Gargamel is beside himself with jealousy. He will see to it that Papa's powers all disappear. And then, he is sure to catch all the Smurfs and celebrate with a big feast... But now, would Papa Smurf let such a bad thing happen? Surely not, Papa finds a way to foil Gargamel's plan...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Scarlet Croaker: Greenpeedeepee Swamp is the only place you can find Swamp Root, the delicious and necessary ingredient of Greedy Smurf's famed swamp root stew. Unfortunately, it is also one place where you can find those hideous Wartmongers. Even though Sassette and the Smurfs save a young Wartmonger's life, they still end up being captured by the others. But the Scarlet Croaker will save them! Maybe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Comet Is Coming!: Papa's note to the Smurfs about viewing a comet is delivered torn. The Smurfs read only the first part and think their world is coming to an end. They plan how to spend their last day until Papa returns to clear up the misunderstanding and assure them that they are safe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Rose: Smurfette promises Mother Nature that if she creates a blue rose Smurfette will never cut it. But when the white rose becomes blue, Smurfette becomes white. The only way to make Smurfette blue again is for her to cut the rose. She reluctantly cuts the rose, returning nature to normalcy and learning that one cannot always keep a promise.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's Giant: The evil wizard Gargamel wants to create a monster. A horrible, gigantic creature, an awesome being that is going to destroy all the Smurfs! But Gargamel makes a slight mistake, and the result is going to astonish him and his cat Azrael.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sweepy Smurf: Sweepy the chimney sweep Smurf is not the most popular inhabitant of the Village of the Smurfs. He is rather messy, and the clouds of soot that he makes certainly don't add to his popularity. Only the Smurflings find him great company as he's the only one who can get dirty and not be told off. Yet in their enthusiasm for Sweepy, the Smurflings endanger the Village.

programme.title: How To Smurf A Rainbow
programme.desc: Mother Nature is too busy to conjure a rainbow for the Smurfs' festival, so Papa Smurf borrows her cookbook and mixes up the recipe himself. As there is no yellow available, they use the leprechaun's gold to produce a beautiful rainbow before Gargamel can steal it.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Never Smurf Off Till Tomorrow: A fierce wind carries the Smurfs' windmill away, with several Smurfs inside. Is Lazy Smurf really at fault or is an injustice being committed? Are the captive Smurfs going to be saved from the volcano's crater? Is Brainy going to smurf up his mouth for a moment?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Laugh: Gargamel has found a new diabolical scheme to get rid of the Smurfs: a glittering powder that is going to reduce them to helpless laughter...

programme.title: The Littlest Witch
programme.desc: On an errand to Witch Haven for Papa Smurf, the little blue creatures meet a tiny witch and teach her how to be good while at the same time cause another witch to lose her wicked powers for one year after she falls into the river.

programme.title: The Trojan Smurf
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil wizard, has devised a new plan to capture the Smurfs: he builds a giant statue in the shape of Papa Smurf. Thus, he hopes, the Smurfs are going to drag the statue into their Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf: Yes, there can be too much of a good thing. When an accident happens to Papa Smurf's magic formula and he ends up multiplied by two, the Smurfs are elated: two Papa Smurfs can give twice the good counsel and twice the loving that one can. But after a while, things get too complex in the Village. Especially when another accident doubles the number of Gargamels!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's Giant: The evil wizard Gargamel wants to create a monster. A horrible, gigantic creature, an awesome being that is going to destroy all the Smurfs! But Gargamel makes a slight mistake, and the result is going to astonish him and his cat Azrael.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Grouchy Makes A Splash: We all know Grouchy Smurf hates a lot of things. But one thing he hates more than anything else is water, when there is enough of it to drown in. You see, Grouchy can't swim. And when the Smurfs notice this peculiarity and try to teach him how to survive in water, the evil wizard Gargamel makes things a little more dangerous than they ought to be....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf The Other Cheek: Hefty Smurf meets an old Trolless in the forest, and the old crone begs him to relieve her of a red spot on her nose by... giving her a good kick here and now! Hefty half-heartedly obliges... And the result is a big surprise for him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bookworm Smurf: Brainy Smurf is aghast. Sassette cannot read, and thus might be forever prevented from learning the pearls of wisdom collected in his book "Brainy Smurf's quotations"! He tries teaching her how to read. What she can read almost from the start is a formula to make all the books disappear! All the books in the world, including Gargamel's spells and Homnibus' books of remedies!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Grouchiest Game In Town: A strange little imp who is a master at games challenges the Smurfs to a contest. He turns the Smurflings into rigid game pieces and forces Grouchy, who never wins at games, into playing for the Smurflings' lives. Grouchy gains confidence, makes the right move, and frees the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Kaplowey Scroll
programme.desc: There is a terrifying magic word. When you direct the word at something or someone, you make it vanish into nothingness! Can the Smurfs undo its evil power before Gargamel gets hold of it?

programme.title: Educating Bigmouth
programme.desc: The Smurfs try to teach Bigmouth about romance, manners, and getting a job after Bignose kicks him out. He returns to her refined, but Bigteeth is courting Bignose. Bignose realizes what she was missing and takes Bigmouth back to live happily ever after.

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfic Games: The Smurfs discover the spirit and joy of friendly competition when they hold their first "Smurfic Games". After a near miss with the troublesome cat Azrael, the Smurfs decide they need to get into better shape. Papa Smurf suggests that the Smurfs tone their bodies as well as sharpen their athletic abilities by inaugurating the "Smurfic Games".

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Dancing Shoes: An evil imp gives Smurfette dancing shoes and then tricks her into promising to marry him. All her little friends rush to her rescue and Papa Smurf magically puts the dancing shoes on the imp. He is forced to dance off into the night.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy: Gargamel's theft of the Fairies' gold almost brings a state of war between the Fairies and the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Crooner Smurf: Harmony Smurf is no longer wanted in the Smurf Choir: his singing is too far off-key. But Papa Smurf gives him an amulet that will make him a vocal virtuoso. Now here comes Hogatha...

programme.title: The Smurfiest Of Friends
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf had one friend: Clumsy Smurf. But poor Clumsy is so, well, clumsy, that Brainy refuses to see him again. So now he is left without anyone willing to listen to him. Maybe Buddy, the good-looking imp met by chance near the Great Oak can be a pal for Brainy....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Float Full Of Smurfs: The Smurfs must find a bunny family to pull their float in the Autumn Carnival. Gargamel sees his chance to capture the little blue people and disguises himself as a giant bunny. Is he going to catch all the Smurfs in one fell swoop?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Traveller: A dragon terrorizes the Village of the Smurfs. To put the dragon to rest, the Smurfs must find the noted Chinese traveler. Fortunately, Papa Smurf is able to understand the strange customs of the stranger, and even to speak a few words.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Forget-Me-Smurfs: Little Sickly turns into a hero when he forgets his ailments and saves the rest of the Smurfs from the deadly forget-me flowers.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.desc: 2015 Constellation Cup-2nd Test: The pace intensifies as Australia looks to extend their lead. But the Ferns aren’t backing down. Expect precision shooting and defensive grit in a match that could swing either way.

programme.title: Ferns Greatest Battles: 2015 Cup

programme.title: Ferns Greatest Battles: 2015 Cup

programme.title: Praise
programme.desc: Praise features the best in contemporary Christian music and worship, fresh and impacting ministry voices, engaging interviews from a wide variety of guests, and a fast-moving hour of relevant talk you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Hagee Ministries
programme.desc: John Hagee is the founder and senior pastor of Cornerstone Church in San Antonio, Texas.; John Hagee Ministries telecasts his national television and radio teachings throughout America and internationally; the mission of John Hagee Ministries is to take the Gospel to all the world and to all generations.

programme.title: Turning Point With Dr. David Jeremiah
programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: Joseph Prince
programme.desc: Receiving the Lord's freedom, favor and victory through right believing.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Kingdom Connection With Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: Pastor Jentezen Franklin brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in the Word of God.

programme.title: Robert Jeffress
programme.desc: The teaching ministry of American Southern Baptist, pastor and television host, Robert Jeffress; he is a senior minister of the first Baptist Church in Dallas as well as a Fox News contributor.

programme.title: Michael A. Youssef
programme.desc: Pastor Michael Youssef proclaims God's word to all the people around the world through the ministries of Leading The Way.

programme.title: Time of Grace With Pastor Mike Novotny
programme.desc: Connecting people to God's grace, love, glory and power and showing that the temporary things of life don't satisfy. Showing that what brings satisfaction is knowing that Jesus lived, died, and rose for all, providing access to eternal life with God.

programme.title: Tony Evans
programme.desc: Tony Evans communicates that God has real answers for real problems facing America today.

programme.title: Truths that Transform
programme.desc: Featuring Rob Pacienza, with sermon commentary from D. James Kennedy; an analysis of current moral and cultural controversies, all from a Biblical perspective.

programme.title: Andrew Wommack: Gospel Truth
programme.desc: Hebrews: Living in the New Covenant Reality. Many Christians aren't living in the freedom that Jesus purchased for us. Most people mix the old covenant with the new covenant which shouldn't be done.

programme.title: All In With Jordan Easley
programme.desc: Pastor Jordan Easley seeks to help believers and unbelievers understand and apply God's word to their lives.

programme.title: Dr. Jeremiah Johnston: Body of Proof
programme.desc: Acclaimed apologist and scholar Dr. Jeremiah Johnston sets out to show why Jesus' victory over death is central to a believer's faith.

programme.title: Higher Aim With Dr. Curt Dodd
programme.desc: Dr. Curt Dodd seeks to proclaim the gospel globally to encourage transforming encounters.

programme.title: Kingdom Connection With Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: Pastor Jentezen Franklin brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in the Word of God.

programme.title: Allen Jackson Ministries
programme.desc: What's the best way to prepare for the uncertain future? Trust God with our resources! Pastor Allen Jackson talks about biblical principles surrounding the money, resources, and possessions.

programme.title: Rejoice in the Lord
programme.desc: Inspirational music and lessons from Campus Church in Pensacola, Fla.

programme.title: Amazing Facts With Doug Batchelor
programme.desc: What is real repentance?

programme.title: Passion With Louie Giglio
programme.desc: Messages of hope and redemption from Passion City Church in Atlanta, Georgia, with Louie Giglio.

programme.title: The Great Life With Mike Kai
programme.desc: Move the needle from average to extraordinary.

programme.title: Church Without Walls
programme.desc: Pastor Ralph D. West brings encouraging messages from the Church Without Walls in Houston, TX.

programme.title: A.R. Bernard
programme.desc: Navigating the intersection of faith and culture.

programme.title: Faithful Galileans
programme.desc: An intimate worship session in a remote Galilean location, blending music with spiritual reflection.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.desc: Bayless Conley shares why one can't enjoy the peace of eternal life without declaring the truth of who Jesus really is.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Author and evangelist Joel Osteen spreads his message of love and hope as he preaches at the 30,000-plus member Lakewood Church in Houston. The program can be seen in more than 100 countries. Osteen urges people to live at their full potential and form a close relationship with God.

programme.title: Joseph Prince

programme.title: Life Today With James Robison

In a desperate last-ditch effort, Sonny adopts 5-year-old Julian (Dylan Sprouse), (Cole Sprouse) to impress her. She's not impressed ... and he can't return the kid. Uh-oh for Sonny!

programme.title: Joe Dirt
programme.desc: He's the wrong person, at the wrong place, at the wrong time. Joe Dirt (David Spade) is a janitor with a mullet hairdo, acid-washed jeans and a dream -- to find the parents that he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was eight. As his wandering, misguided search takes him from one misadventure to another, he finds his way to Los Angeles, where a shock-jock (Dennis Miller) brings Joe on the radio to insult him. But as Joe's story unfolds, jeers turn to cheers, and an entire city is captivated.

programme.desc: The Big Game is back in Las Vegas for another thrilling season, featuring an amateur player taking on some of the biggest names in poker, including Jennifer Tilly. Also joining the action is legendary soccer star Gerard Piqué.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The European Poker Tour celebrates its 20th anniversary in Barcelona, the city where it all began. Nearly 2,000 players compete in the Main Event for a €1.5m first prize. EPT legends return to the tables and reigning champ Simon Wiciak looks to defend his title.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Day 2 of the European Poker Tour Main Event continues, with PSPC champion Ramon Colillas, the USA's Rania Nasreddine and Canada's Griffin Benger among the players hoping to survive the session and stay in contention for the title, trophy and €1.5m top prize.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: They're on the bubble in the European Poker Tour Main Event. The next six players to be eliminated will leave with nothing. The rest will be guaranteed a slice of the €9.5m prize pool. Can YouTube star Wolfgang Poker and Canadian pro Griffin Benger make it into the money?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: At the European Poker Tour's 20th anniversary celebrations, there's a throwback vibe in the Main Event. A player calling himself 'The Eliminator' is holding court at the feature table. Expect banter and bluffs, as this old school character competes for the €1.5m first prize.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Survival is the name of the game, with just over 100 players remaining in the European Poker Tour Main Event. Most of the €9.5m prize pool is still up for grabs, and reigning champ Simon Wiciak and Monte-Carlo finalist Rania Nasreddine can both make EPT history.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: There's €1.5m for the winner of this special anniversary edition of the European Poker Tour. As Day 4 of the Main Event continues, the USA's Rania Nasreddine is put through the wringer and a new generation of poker talent starts to make its mark.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Only 40 players remain in the European Poker Tour Main Event, including reigning champion Simon Wiciak. Can the French pro go back-to-back? The competition is tough: chip leader Stephen Song and Monte-Carlo finalist Rania Nasreddine are also eyeing the €1.5m top prize.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: In the late stages of this European Poker Tour Main Event, mistakes are starting to creep in. But there's no margin for error, with millions still on the line. Among the final 23 are American pro Stephen Song and former EPT finalist Rania Nasreddine.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: All eyes are on the USA's Rania Nasreddine, as she tries to make back-to-back European Poker Tour final tables. Brazilian pro Fabiano Kovalski is another previous EPT finalist looking for a second chance at victory. The top prize in this tournament is €1.5m.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Nine remain in the Main Event. Two are on course to make history. One will be crowned champion and earn $1.5m. The USA's Stephen Song and Rania Nasreddine are among the players battling chip leader Fabiano Kovalski for supremacy.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: It's the final table of the Main Event and the conclusion of the European Poker Tour's 20th anniversary celebrations. Three American players, including Rania Nasreddine, are among the final six. Who will lift the trophy and earn the first prize of $1.5m?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Super High Roller (SHR)-The €100,000 Super High Roller reaches its climactic finale with six elite players vying for nearly €1.4 million. Leading the pack is 2015 Monte Carlo Main Event champion Adrian Mateos, facing off against poker heavyweights Mikita Badziakouski, László Bujtas, and Marius Gierse, plus wildcards Kent Staahle and Mikalai Vaskaboinikau. With life-changing money on the line, who will claim the prestigious title?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 1 (ME1)-After a three-year hiatus, the prestigious EPT Monte Carlo €5,000 Main Event returns in spectacular fashion. Day 2 brings together poker's biggest names, including high-stakes specialist Patrik Antonius, World Champion Koray Aldemir, Italian ace Mustapha Kanit, and trailblazing two-time EPT champion Victoria Coren-Mitchell. The battle for poker immortality begins.

programme.title: The Comeback with Craig Carton
programme.desc: Craig Carton sits down with those who have experienced the highs and lows of gambling addiction to amplify their stories, break down the stigma surrounding gambling disorder, raise awareness of support resources for individuals and their families, and show that recovery is possible.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 2 (ME2)-Tension mounts as the money bubble approaches in Monte Carlo's Main Event. With 159 players set to cash for at least €8,690, every decision matters. EPT legends Patrik Antonius and Davidi Kitai command the feature table while 2019 PSPC champion Ramon Colillas holds the chip lead. Who will survive the bubble and who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 3 (ME3)-The money bubble has burst, but for seasoned pro Ole Schemion-who has earned over $5 million in Monte Carlo alone-a minimum cash isn't enough. He faces a formidable challenge from French star Gaëlle Baumann and online legend Jussi Nevanlinna at the feature table. With real money now guaranteed, the gloves come off.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 4 (ME4)-PSPC champion Ramon Colillas surges into the top five as just 40 players remain in the EPT Monte Carlo Main Event. Day 3 intensifies as competitors battle to reach the final two tables. With the finish line in sight, who has what it takes to keep their championship dreams alive?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 5 (ME5)-The field narrows to just 16 survivors, including EPT Dublin champion Niall Farrell and PSPC winner Ramon Colillas. With over €41,000 already locked up, the stakes couldn't be higher as players fight for their place at the final table of nine. Every hand could be the difference between glory and heartbreak.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.desc: Debra believes that Clayton has been cheating on her, and she's fed up; Destiny and Zary were about to start dating until they found out they might have the same father.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Despite the evidence, Gillespie and Tibbs do not believe a teenage mother was responsible for the death of her abandoned infant.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Tibbs' father-in-law creates friction; Gillespie placates a city council angry over attacks on senior citizens.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie (Carroll O'Connor) believes an assault victim (guest star Caryn West) is lying about her attacker. With Howard Rollins.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Two feuding sisters become murder suspects when it is discovered that their father died from poisoning, not heart failure.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: An ambitious councilman (O.J. Simpson) won't support black workers who crossed an all-white picket line.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Bubba (Alan Autry) is accused of the violent rape of a young black woman (Vanessa Bell Calloway). With Carroll O'Connor and Howard Rollins.

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: A woman must put her life back together after her husband of 18 years abruptly kicks her out of the house.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge, Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn and Terri, respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Monty (Idris Elba), a mechanic, struggles to make ends meet and raise his three young daughters alone. When his drug-dealing ex-wife wins custody of the girls in court, he enlists the help of Julia (Gabrielle Union), a successful attorney, to get the girls back. Romance unexpectedly blooms between the pair, but the couple must come to terms with their very different lives and find a way to keep Monty's family together.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: After a high-speed car chase, Madea (Tyler Perry) winds up behind bars because her quick temper gets the best of her. Meanwhile, Assistant District Attorney Josh Hardaway (Derek Luke) lands a case that's too personal to handle: that of a young prostitute and former drug addict named Candace (Keshia Knight Pulliam). When Candace winds up in jail, Madea takes the young woman under her protective wing.

programme.title: Eve's Bayou
programme.desc: Over the course of a long, hot Louisiana summer, a 10-year-old black girl, Eve Batiste (Jurnee Smollett), discovers that her family's affluent existence is merely a facade. The philandering of her suave doctor father, Louis (Samuel L. Jackson), creates a rift, throwing Eve's mother, Roz (Lynn Whitfield), and teenage sister, Cisely (Meagan Good), into emotional turmoil. Eve, though, manages to find some solace with her quirky psychic aunt, Mozelle (Debbi Morgan).

programme.title: Acts of Vengeance
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take -- small-time drug lords -- sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill --- for police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Samin Nosrat ("Good Things: Recipes and Rituals to Share With People You Love: A Cookbook") makes golden chicken soup; Paul Carmichael demos curry shrimp; Yara Herrera makes tres leches cake.

programme.title: The Jennifer Hudson Show
programme.desc: Courtney B. Vance (narrator of the audio book "W.E.B. Du Bois: Biography of a Race, 1868-1919"); 15-year-old twins whose hot-dog stand has gone viral.

programme.title: Sherri
programme.desc: Sherri brings the laughs in The Stand-Up Spot; Sheryl Lee Ralph ("Abbott Elementary"); TV legend Henry Winkler shares details about his 40th book, "Detective Duck: The Mystery at Emerald Pond.".

programme.title: Karamo
programme.desc: Tia moved halfway across the country to be with Isaiah, and now they accuse each other of cheating; Myana believes that Michael could be her father, but he and his wife, Lorrie, have their doubts.

programme.desc: A West Virginia man brings his wife to court because he suspects she's cheating again with an ex-lover.

programme.desc: A Texas man accuses his wife of buying sexy costumes to role play with another man.

programme.desc: A New York couple are in turmoil after cheating concerns have caused them to question the paternity of their baby.

programme.desc: A Tennessee woman admits to cheating on her husband several times but brings him to court to prove he is her son's biological father.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A first date produces a due date and now a Georgia woman is determined to prove that her ex-boyfriend is the biological father of her 4-month-old son.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: A local judge running for public office frames an ex-con for the murder of his alcoholic wife and kills him, claiming self-defense.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Parker Williams is placed in a difficult position when his hot-tempered stepfather is arrested for the murder of his former employer.

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: After he discovers events from his past are repeating, Donovan (Danny Glover) is convinced his young neighbor and her mother will die on the same day his wife and daughter were killed 30 years ago.

programme.title: Eve's Bayou
programme.desc: Over the course of a long, hot Louisiana summer, a 10-year-old black girl, Eve Batiste (Jurnee Smollett), discovers that her family's affluent existence is merely a facade. The philandering of her suave doctor father, Louis (Samuel L. Jackson), creates a rift, throwing Eve's mother, Roz (Lynn Whitfield), and teenage sister, Cisely (Meagan Good), into emotional turmoil. Eve, though, manages to find some solace with her quirky psychic aunt, Mozelle (Debbi Morgan).

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: After a wild one-night stand, a successful sports agent watches his perfect life slowly disappear when he discovers the sexy and mysterious woman he risked everything for is a determined police detective who entangles him in her latest investigation. As he tries desperately to put the pieces together, he falls deeper into her trap, risking his family, his career, and even his life.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: A firefighter does something unexpected after a man that he has been ordered to testify against threatens him.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show

programme.desc: A woman from New Jersey seeks the court's help to find out if her estranged husband is back to his old habits.

programme.desc: The single mother of a 3-month old boy brings her unsupportive ex-boyfriend to court, demanding that he stops ignoring his paternal responsibilities.
