programme.title: 66 minutes
programme.desc: Chambre à part, le secret du bonheur ?\r\nEt si le secret de la longévité en amour était… de faire chambre à part ? Ronflements, insomnies, réveils décalés ou lit trop petit… pour certains couples, le vrai luxe, ce n’est plus de dormir côte à côte, mais de dormir chacun dans sa chambre ! Longtemps tabou, ce choix s’assume de plus en plus. En France, près d’un couple sur dix a décidé de se séparer la nuit, sans se séparer pour autant. Loin du cliché du couple en crise, ces nouveaux adeptes du “chacun son lit” revendiquent une autre façon de s’aimer : plus reposée, plus complice et parfois… plus pimentée ! Car pour eux, la distance fait naître le désir. Et c’est bien connu, les retrouvailles n’en sont que meilleures. Nous avons suivi plusieurs couples qui ont fait ce pari audacieux. Certains dorment à part depuis des années, d’autres ont franchi le pas récemment pour sauver leur sommeil… et leur relation. Dans de petits appartements comme dans de grandes maisons, tous racontent comment i

programme.title: 66 minutes
programme.desc: Chaque samedi matin, le cœur d’Arras, dans le Pas-de-Calais, bat au rythme de son marché, le plus ancien de France. Une tradition séculaire qui résiste au temps et continue de faire vivre toute une ville. Ce Grand Format vous propose une immersion au fil des allées de ce marché pas comme les autres, véritable théâtre de la vie locale.\r\nAvant même le lever du soleil, Abdellah, le placier, est déjà sur le pont. Entre rires, coups de stress et poignées de main, il veille à ce que chacun trouve sa place. Autour de lui, des personnages attachants font vivre ce rendez-vous hebdomadaire incontournable.\r\nIl y a Freddy, le boucher-charcutier passionné, qui prépare avec amour ses andouillettes d’Arras et son tout nouveau pâté à la chicorée. Pour lui, le marché, c’est la moitié de son chiffre d’affaires… et 100 % de son énergie. Plus loin, Denis et sa fille Mylène, duo complice et généreux, récoltent leurs pommes de terre à la ferme avant de les offrir à prix malin aux habitués du samedi. Tra

programme.title: Le 2010, Anne-Sophie Lapix

programme.desc: Les terriers des animaux, un monde fascinant caché sous la terre ! / Les égouts, un labyrinthe souterrain qui en dit long sur notre quotidien !

programme.title: Zone interdite
programme.desc: C’est une première en France ! L’ouverture de deux prisons de haute-sécurité conçues pour enfermer les deux-cents narcotrafiquants les plus dangereux de France. Les caméras de Zone Interdite ont pu pénétrer en exclusivité au cœur des centres pénitentiaires de Condé-sur-Sarthe (Orne) et de Vendin-le-Vieil (Pas-de-Calais). Un programme mis en place après l’évasion sanglante de Mohamed Amra qu’il aurait commanditée depuis sa cellule. Arrêté depuis, il est aujourd’hui incarcéré à Vendin-le-Vieil. Vous découvrirez comment les deux établissements ont été pensés pour maintenir les détenus dans un isolement total afin qu’ils ne puissent plus continuer à diriger leurs trafics comme ils ont pu le faire dans d’autres établissements. De la naissance du projet jusqu’au transfert sous haute surveillance de ces criminels hors-norme, nous avons suivi durant plusieurs mois toutes les coulisses de ce dispositif exceptionnel.\r\nÀ Condé-sur-Sarthe, le directeur Vincent Vernet est habitué à faire régner u

programme.title: Zone interdite
programme.desc: E4 Au coeur des nouvelles prisons de haute sécurité Zone Interdite a pu pénétrer au coeur des centres pénitentiaires de Condé-sur-Sarthe et de Vendin-le-Vieil, deux prisons de haute-sécurité conçues pour enfermer les 200 narcotrafiquants les plus dangereux de France. Ces établissements ont été pensés pour maintenir les détenus dans un isolement total.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: La France produit près de 340 millions de tonnes de déchets par an, un des volumes les plus élevés d’Europe. En marge des filières légales, 35 000 dépôts sauvages prolifèrent sur tout le territoire. Et de lucratifs trafics de déchets s’organisent, faisant peser des risques sur notre environnement et notre santé.\r\nÀ Forbach, en Moselle, la forêt se transforme en décharge. À quelques kilomètres de la frontière allemande, nos caméras ont filmé des automobilistes qui déchargent en pleine nature des gravats, des appareils sanitaires hors d’usage et surtout des pneus usés. Les marquages relevés sur de nombreux pneus attestent d’un usage outre-Rhin. Car en Allemagne, leur reprise est encadrée et facturée ; côté français, l’amende théorique (jusqu’à 1 500 euros) dissuade peu. Résultat : le ramassage de ces tonnes de déchets est assuré par des bénévoles épuisés, écœurés de voir les sols pollués.\r\nÀ Périgueux, en Dordogne, les habitants craquent ! Ici, il faut déposer soi-même ses ordures mé

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc:
En 2022, le nombre d’arnaques à domicile a explosé. Huit millions de Français ont été dépouillés chez eux. C’est deux fois plus qu’il y a dix ans. 
Pour tromper la vigilance de leurs victimes, les escrocs redoublent d’imagination. Et surtout, ils ne craignent plus la justice : neuf fois sur dix, les auteurs d’arnaques à domicile sont des récidivistes. Rien ne semble pouvoir les arrêter.
La grande arnaque du moment, c’est le vol par fausse qualité. Les escrocs prétendent exercer une profession rassurante pour tromper leurs victimes et s’introduire chez elles. Comme cet homme déguisé en postier qui a dérobé les cartes bancaires d'une dizaine de personnes âgées à Annecy (Haute-Savoie). Un mode opératoire inédit qui donne du fil à retordre aux enquêteurs de police.
D’autres escrocs agissent à visage découvert pour voler leurs anciens clients. C’est l’histoire de ce vendeur de matelas de la région toulousaine, accusé d’avoir arnaqué des dizaines de personnes à qui il avait vendu de

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: Le procureur de Bobigny dresse un constat alarmant : en Seine-Saint-Denis en 2024, le nombre d’homicides liés au narcotrafic a triplé, 15 morts, et les tentatives d'homicides, 73, sur fond de stupéfiants ont explosé.\r\nLa guerre de territoire sans merci que se livrent les narcotrafiquants fait de la Seine-Saint-Denis l'un des départements les plus criminogènes de France. Pour préserver leurs points de deal, qui peuvent rapporter jusqu'à 50 000 euros par jour, les dealers ne reculent devant aucune exaction. Les sommes en jeu sont colossales : le trafic génère 600 millions d'euros chaque année dans le département.\r\nCannabis mais aussi cocaïne, héroïne ou crack sont vendus à ciel ouvert, dans les 183 points de deal « recensés » par les forces de l’ordre. Les méthodes des trafiquants évoluent en permanence. Vente sur les réseaux sociaux appelée Uber Shit, dealers mineurs et même programmes de fidélisation des clients grâce à des jeux à gratter… Les forces de l'ordre font face à des déli

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: Des candidats vont tenter leur chance pour dénicher les mots et expressions cachés, tout en espérant décrocher les plus gros gains offerts par la roue de la fortune. Mais attention, ils devront éviter la redoutable banqueroute et les autres pièges qu’elle réserve. Chaque jour, trois candidats s'affrontent à travers cinq manches, durant lesquelles ils doivent résoudre une énigme en découvrant un mot ou des expressions. Trouver une consonne leur rapporte de l'argent, tandis que les voyelles sont payantes. À la fin de la cinquième manche, celui ayant amassé le plus d'argent accède à la finale, ce qui lui offre le droit de revenir le lendemain. Lors de la finale, il peut remporter jusqu'à 20 000 euros ou un voyage, à condition de résoudre une ultime énigme en seulement 10 secondes !

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: S1 La roue de la fortune.

programme.title: La meilleure cuisine régionale, c'est chez moi !
programme.desc: De la Corse à l’Alsace, de l’Auvergne à la Provence, des dizaines de restaurateurs bien décidés à faire briller leur région vont accueillir chez eux les chefs Norbert Tarayre et Yoann Conte ! Leur but : partager et faire découvrir le plus typique, le plus gourmand, le plus authentique des spécialités locales afin de remporter le titre de meilleur restaurant de leur région. Une compétition faites de secrets culinaires, d’astuces incroyables, de folklore et d’émotion auprès de ceux qui font vivre l’identité gastronomique de nos régions !

programme.title: Le 19.45
programme.desc: E286 Le journal de M6.

programme.title: L'amour est dans le pré
programme.desc: Pour cette saison anniversaire, quinze agriculteurs, hommes et femmes, âgés de 26 à 67 ans, se lancent dans cette aventure pour trouver l’âme sœur qui partagera leur vie à la campagne.\r\nAux côtés de Karine Le Marchand, partez à la rencontre de ces personnalités aussi authentiques qu’attachantes. Entre fous rires, moments d’émotion et tendres déclarations, ces 15 cœurs à prendre nous rappellent que l’amour ne connaît ni âge, ni frontières, ni limites.\r\nLaissez-vous donc charmer par les agriculteurs de cette saison 20 et écoutez attentivement leurs confidences.

programme.title: L'amour est dans le pré
programme.desc: S20 E8 En Normandie, Gilles a-t-il fait son choix entre Pascaline et Isabelle ? Dans la Creuse, Jean-Baptiste accueille Steven et David, qui lui ont fait grand effet lors du speed-dating à Paris. L'idylle d'Evelyne et Anthony se poursuit-elle ? Personne n'est au bout de ses émotions, et les surprises ne manquent pas.

programme.title: L'amour vu du pré
programme.desc: Pour la première fois, les agriculteurs de la saison en cours - dont Gilles, Julien, Jean-Louis et Océane - rejoindront les anciens participants sur le fameux canapé. L’émotion sera au rendez-vous lorsque les héros de la saison 20 découvriront en direct leurs aventures sentimentales, entourés de leurs proches. Les agriculteurs et prétendantes des saisons précédentes seront également de la partie, offrant un mélange parfait entre fraîcheur et expérience.\r\nPartagez avec eux des fous rires contagieux, des confessions touchantes et des souvenirs émouvants.

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Comme des millions de Français, ils se sont rencontrés en ligne, sur les réseaux sociaux, un forum de discussion ou une application de rencontres, et ont décidé de franchir le pas, en passant du fantasme à la réalité. Ils se sont donné rendez-vous dans le château d’Ermenonville, aux portes de Paris, un lieu propice au romantisme pour une première rencontre. Mais que va-t-il se passer lorsqu’ils se verront pour la première fois ?

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: S2 E8 De nouveaux couples vont répondre à cette question : peut-on craquer sur quelqu'un que l'on n'a jamais rencontré physiquement ? Peut-on tomber amoureux d'une personne à distance, alors qu'on ne l'a jamais vue en vrai ? Comme des millions de Français, ils se sont rencontrés en ligne, sur les réseaux sociaux, un forum de discussion ou une application de rencontres, et ont décidé de franchir le pas.

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Suivez les incroyables histoires d’amour de ces couples qui ont craqué virtuellement l’un pour l’autre, et qui se rencontrent pour la première fois en vrai. Cette fois, c’est au château de Serans, dans l’Oise, que ces amoureux virtuels vont passer du fantasme à la réalité. Et leurs histoires vont, comme toujours, vous faire vibrer. Au programme : de l’amour bien sûr, avec des coups de foudre dès le premier regard et des baisers passionnés au bout de quelques minutes en face-à-face, mais aussi d’énormes déceptions… Une chose est sûre, le passage du virtuel au réel ne vous laissera pas de marbre !

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: L’émission revient sous le feu des projecteurs pour une 20e saison anniversaire explosive qui célèbre la création sous toutes ses formes. De l’humour à la magie, du chant à la contorsion, en passant par la danse ou les circassiens… place à une rafale de performances inédites, de disciplines émergentes et d’audace artistique. Éric Antoine, Marianne James, Hélène Ségara et Sugar Sammy reprennent place derrière le buzzer, toujours aussi enthousiastes et complices. À la présentation, Karine Le Marchand poursuit en marraine bienveillante, entre émotion, complicité et éclats de rire. Au programme : des performances jamais vues, des artistes qui repoussent les codes, et toujours cette promesse intacte : découvrir l’extraordinaire.

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: L’émission revient sous le feu des projecteurs pour une 20e saison anniversaire explosive qui célèbre la création sous toutes ses formes. De l’humour à la magie, du chant à la contorsion, en passant par la danse ou les circassiens… place à une rafale de performances inédites, de disciplines émergentes et d’audace artistique. Éric Antoine, Marianne James, Hélène Ségara et Sugar Sammy reprennent place derrière le buzzer, toujours aussi enthousiastes et complices. À la présentation, Karine Le Marchand poursuit en marraine bienveillante, entre émotion, complicité et éclats de rire. Au programme : des performances jamais vues, des artistes qui repoussent les codes, et toujours cette promesse intacte : découvrir l’extraordinaire.

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent, ça continue
programme.desc: Juju Fitcats propose un rendez-vous à la fois amusant et surprenant qui plonge dans les coulisses de \"La France a un incroyable talent\". Elle part à la rencontre des candidats pour recueillir leurs réactions à chaud, mais aussi celles des membres du jury. Au programme également des images inédites ainsi que des séquences tirées des différentes déclinaisons du programme à travers le monde.

programme.title: Les incroyables talents sont éternels
programme.desc: Retour sur une sélection des meilleurs candidats passés sur la scène de \"La France a un incroyable talent\" depuis 18 saisons. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur talent qui sort de l'ordinaire. L'émission permet également de redécouvrir d'anciens talents, sortis depuis de l'anonymat.

programme.title: Les incroyables talents de la musique
programme.desc: Une sélection des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux passés sur la scène de La France a un incroyable talent ! Revivez le parcours fabuleux des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur voix extraordinaire… L'occasion de redécouvrir aussi d'anciens talents sortis depuis de l'anonymat.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: Au fil des saisons, les pâtissiers ont exploré différents pays, du Japon à l'Italie en passant par le Portugal ou l'Espagne, en réalisant des desserts emblématiques.

programme.title: Le meilleur pâtissier
programme.desc: La thématique de la nature a été à plusieurs reprises au coeur des épreuves des différentes saisons du "Meilleur Pâtissier", comme le rappelle ce florilège.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: When a scandal threatens to completely derail the Barden Bellas, now graduating seniors, the women must get their act together and redeem themselves at the world championships in Copenhagen, Denmark.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys'. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each other's throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friend's girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pixels

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics' and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: Small-time pot dealer David learns the hard way that no good deed goes unpunished. Trying to help some teenagers, he is jumped by thugs and loses his cash and stash. Now David's in big debt to his supplier, and to wipe the slate clean, he must go to Mexico to pick up the guy's latest shipment. To accomplish his mission, Dave devises a foolproof plan: he packs a fake family into a huge RV and heads south of the border for a wild weekend that is sure to end with a bang.

programme.title: Pixels

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and he'll finally get to be the rock star he knows he's destined to be.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon can't let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protégé hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: A writer is trying to fly from New York to Savannah, Georgia, where he is due to be married in two days' time. However, the plane crashes during take-off and the writer inadvertently saves the life of one of his fellow passengers, a free-spirited woman. She then accompanies him as he tries to continue his journey by rental car, train and bus - but he is beset by one disaster after another.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owner's kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protégé hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embarks on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindler's efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindler's efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officer's unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleone's 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: When an ex-cop is told that four androids, known as replicants, who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan have illegally fled back to Earth, he sets out on the trail to terminate them.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richard's throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his family's interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the family's seamier dealings. His descent accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richard's throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: When an ex-cop is told that four androids, known as replicants, who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan have illegally fled back to Earth, he sets out on the trail to terminate them.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay and Jay are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel. Based on the book by Stephen King.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: A young girl develops a growing bond with her no-nonsense aunt as they grow a giant pumpkin for the town's annual contest.

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An action movie star must protect baby pandas from a group of mercenaries.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her son's science teacher.

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: 2025 Blackbird Cup - Alberta Pro Roller Hockey League
programme.desc: The championship game of the Alberta ProRoller Hockey League (APRHL), highlighting Canada's emerging inline hockey talent, community roots, and diverse player stories.

programme.title: National Ball Hockey League
programme.desc: Lace up your shoes and hit the rink -- it's hockey like you've never seen it. Catch the fast-paced action of Tier 1 New Jersey teams in the National Ball Hockey League!

programme.title: 2025 NuLu Bock Fest Goat Racing Championships
programme.desc: NuLu Bock Fest Goat Racing brings new life to a quirky, historic Louisville tradition, once born from travelers racing goats through alleyways as they waited to cross the Ohio River. Ready. Set. Goat!

programme.title: National Putting Tour American Dream's Super Roll of Putting
2025 T-Rex World Championship Races
programme.desc: It's a race of prehistoric proportion as men, women, children and seniors compete to be the 2025 T-Rex World Champion!

programme.title: 2025 Corgi Races at Emerald Downs
programme.desc: Get ready for the cutest and most unpredictable event of the year as over 100 Corgis race for the Championship trophy!

programme.title: 11th Annual Outhouse Races
programme.desc: Teams build their own custom outhouses -- each equipped with a mandatory toilet seat for the driver and a roll within reach. One outhouse races another, with teams straining to push their rig across the finish line and be crowned Fastest Throne.

programme.title: 2025 World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves
programme.desc: The World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves competition rewards the best waves, champion dog surfers have surfed over the past year.

programme.title: Roofball - 2025 RFA Cup
programme.desc: Players from around the country compete for Roofball's RFA Cup championship. Played in Lancaster,Ohio, at the first roof ever purpose-built for the game.

programme.title: The 2024 Onewheel World Championship - Race For The Rail
programme.desc: The World Championship Onewheel Racing event featured the best Onewheel riders zooming down Sky Tavern Ski Mountain in a boardercross style event for $10,000. This race took place outside of Reno, Nevada on August 9th, 2024.

programme.title: 2025 NESSBIC Finals
programme.desc: Top pinball players from across New England compete to take home the Speedy Silver Ball crown.

programme.title: 2025 Golden Tee Golf World Championships
programme.desc: The world's best Golden Tee players converge at the Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas to battle for nearly $200,000 in prizes. The stakes are high, the legends are ready -- who will take home the title in the game that helped shape esports?

programme.title: IWL Wrestball 3x3
programme.desc: The explosive fusion of basketball, rugby, and wrestling -- where agility, power, and strategy collide. Be the first to experience this new-rules-arena revolution.

programme.title: Battle Court Jai-Alai Championship VII
programme.desc: Battle Court VII is the most highly anticipated Jai-Alai event of the year.The World Jai-Alai League's Championship game features Udonis Haslem's two-time title holders, The Renegades, versus the newest expansion team in the League, The Fireballs.

programme.title: Swiss Stone Tossing
programme.desc: Contestants grunt and hurl earth-shaped stones in their natural state -- no polish, no shine. The furthest legal toss without crossing the line takes the win. It's simple, primal, and strangely satisfying.

programme.title: Mailboat Jumping
programme.desc: Carriers compete to secure a spot on the historic Mailboat Team, jumping from boat to dock and back again while in motion. It's part timing, part chaos,and a century-old tradition that defines summer. Don't fall in-or do, but don't expect sympathy.

programme.title: 2025 National Bubble Gum Blowing Championship
programme.desc: Finalists chew. They blow. They pray it doesn't pop too soon. The biggest unburst bubble wins. One gum blower will be crowned the 2025 Champion. The rest go home sticky and defeated.

programme.title: FlingGolf: LFC-5 Longest FlingShot Championship
programme.desc: With FlingSticks and golf balls, top World League FlingGolf Pros battle to outdistance each other and take home the LFC Belt.

programme.title: Roofball - 2025 RFA Cup
programme.desc: Players from around the country compete for Roofball's RFA Cup championship. Played in Lancaster,Ohio, at the first roof ever purpose-built for the game.

programme.title: The Goodyear Blimp Sky Race of the Century
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of the Goodyear Blimp in 2025, Goodyear brought all three of its U.S. airships to Akron, Ohio for the Sky Race of the Century. While blimps aren't known for speed, this race has no shortage of action.

programme.title: Diving Chess: Duel in the Depths
programme.desc: Two champions face off in a high-stakes underwater chess match -- where every move is made on a single breath.

programme.title: Freestyle Chess Grand Slam - Paris Final: Best Of Show
programme.desc: ESPN8 presents highlights from the epic final between Magnus Carlsen and Hikaru Nakamura in Paris -- featuring key moments, tactics, emotions, interviews, and the intensity of this groundbreaking chess format.

programme.title: World Series of Armwrestling Finals Season 3
programme.desc: The World Series of Armwrestling brings the top arm wrestlers around the US to compete for over $100,000 in cash and prizes in the largest cash tournament in the world!

programme.title: 360 Hoops Championship
programme.desc: Watch the Great American Events on ESPN.

programme.title: Padel Ping Pong Championship
programme.desc: A mixture of Ping Pong and Squash, this innovative sport creates a creative blend of hand eye coordination, power and finesse. It's the Padel Ping Pong Championship, two on two competition from the sport's birthplace in Sweden.

programme.title: Ultimate Ninja World Series Finals
programme.desc: The Ultimate Ninja World Series Finals is a culmination of the best of the best athletes in the world at ninja obstacles. It is the largest ninja obstacle competition in the world and these pros are vying for pride and prize money.

programme.title: World Axe & Knife Throwing Championship 2025
programme.desc: Axes and knives fly as we watch the finals to crown World Champions in all Axe and Knife Throwing disciplines for the 2025 World Axe & Knife Throwing Championship.

programme.title: Microsoft Excel World Championship 2024 Finals
programme.desc: Microsoft Excel World Championship is an Excel Esports competition where players solve unusual game tasks in Microsoft Excel. For the second year, the Finals were held at the HyperXArena Las Vegas, uniting top players from around the globe.

programme.title: Never Tell Me the Odds
programme.desc: Slippery stairs and Skywalkers -- it's a special draft! Ryan McGee, ClintonYates, and Arda Ocal get heated and hilarious as they make their Star Wars picks for their teams in the galaxy far,far away.

programme.title: Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship
programme.desc: The Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship brings together the top qualifiers from across the country. A head-to-head, tournament-style competition and the thrilling finale of the Pop-A-Shot National Series.

programme.title: OmegaBall World Invitational
programme.desc: Three-team soccer with no offsides, on a circular pitch. Teams defend their own goal, but can score on the other two, and it's 10x more goals than traditional soccer!

programme.title: 2025 NWLA All-Star Game
programme.desc: Top Wiffle Ball® leagues from across the country come together for the NWLA All-Star Game -- a fast-paced, backyard showdown of elite national talent.

programme.title: Major League Paintball
programme.desc: Watch the Great American Events on ESPN.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: The Domonique Foxworth Show
programme.desc: Domonique Foxworth shares his take on current sports events and participants.

programme.title: Overreaction Monday
programme.desc: A weekly staple on 'The Rich Eisen Show' since 2018, 'Overreaction Monday' is now also an extended podcast with Rich and Chris Brockman debating the latest in the NFL.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: Each episode gives viewers an inside look at television, film and music, including interviews with each industry's biggest stars. Over the years, many celebrities have "broken their silence" regarding various scandals or tragedies with hosts and correspondents from "ET." In addition to covering breaking news, the show visits sets of movies and TV shows and heads to the red carpet to cover awards shows and other major events. Airing daily since 1981, "Entertainment Tonight" is the template by which many other entertainment newsmagazines are based.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The future of civilization rests in the fate of the One Ring, which has been lost for centuries. Powerful forces are unrelenting in their search for it. But fate has placed it in the hands of a young Hobbit named Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood), who inherits the Ring and steps into legend. A daunting task lies ahead for Frodo when he becomes the Ringbearer - to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom where it was forged.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: The sequel to the Golden Globe-nominated and AFI Award-winning "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers" follows the continuing quest of Frodo (Elijah Wood) and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam (Sean Astin) discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), the Elf archer Legolas and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: The culmination of nearly 10 years' work and conclusion to Peter Jackson's epic trilogy based on the timeless J.R.R. Tolkien classic, "The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King" presents the final confrontation between the forces of good and evil fighting for control of the future of Middle-earth. Hobbits Frodo and Sam reach Mordor in their quest to destroy the `one ring', while Aragorn leads the forces of good against Sauron's evil army at the stone city of Minas Tirith.

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
programme.desc: It is 1941 and the world is in the throes of war. Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) wants to do his part and join America's armed forces, but the military rejects him because of his small stature. Finally, Steve gets his chance when he is accepted into an experimental program that turns him into a supersoldier called Captain America. Joining forces with Bucky Barnes (Sebastian Stan) and Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell), Captain America leads the fight against the Nazi-backed HYDRA organization.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: After uncovering a massive conspiracy, an embattled NYPD detective joins a citywide manhunt for two young cop killers. As the night unfolds, he soon becomes unsure of who to pursue -- and who's in pursuit of him. When the search intensifies, authorities decide to take extreme measures by closing all of Manhattan's 21 bridges to prevent the suspects from escaping.

programme.title: Mile 22
programme.desc: CIA operative James Silva leads a small but lethal paramilitary team on an urgent and dangerous mission. They must transport a foreign intelligence asset from an American embassy in Southeast Asia to an airfield for extraction -- a distance of 22 miles. Silva and the soldiers soon find themselves in a race against time as the city's military, police and street gangs close in to reclaim the asset.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team investigates the 1963 murder of a teenage girl who dressed and acted like a boy; Valens learns the result of Internal Affairs' investigation of him.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Investigating the fatal shooting of a college student 25 years earlier, the team suspects several former coeds who accused him of date rape.

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.desc: Sam and Dean's road trip to fight monsters and demons is chronicled entirely from the Impala's perspective.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a series of murders at a bed and breakfast that used to be Lizzie Borden's home, but when a man says he saw a little girl hanging around near the time of the murders, the Winchesters suspect Amara is responsible.

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: Sworn to preserve intergalactic order, the Green Lantern Corps has existed for centuries. Its newest recruit, Hal Jordan, is the first human to join the ranks. The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have thus far been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a gifted and cocky test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when a new enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
programme.desc: It is 1941 and the world is in the throes of war. Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) wants to do his part and join America's armed forces, but the military rejects him because of his small stature. Finally, Steve gets his chance when he is accepted into an experimental program that turns him into a supersoldier called Captain America. Joining forces with Bucky Barnes (Sebastian Stan) and Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell), Captain America leads the fight against the Nazi-backed HYDRA organization.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: Peter Quill and his fellow Guardians are hired by a powerful alien race, the Sovereign, to protect their precious batteries from invaders. When it is discovered that Rocket has stolen the items they were sent to guard, the Sovereign dispatch their armada to search for vengeance. As the Guardians try to escape, the mystery of Peter's parentage is revealed.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Diana Prince lives quietly among mortals in the vibrant, sleek 1980s -- an era of excess driven by the pursuit of having it all. Though she's come into her full powers, she maintains a low profile by curating ancient artifacts, and only performing heroic acts incognito. But soon, Diana will have to muster all of her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah, a villainess who possesses superhuman strength and agility.

programme.title: Live: The Paul Finebaum Show
programme.desc: Veteran writer, reporter and radio personality Paul Finebaum built a legion of loyal sports fans as the "Voice of the SEC" during 20 years hosting his Birmingham, Ala.-based radio talk show. When ESPN launched the SEC Network in 2014, it was only natural that Finebaum became its first on-air hire, bringing his radio show -- and those passionate followers -- with him. Now originating from one of the SEC Network studios in Charlotte, N.C., the show is a forum for lively discussion and debate of all things SEC and across the spectrum of college sports, with Finebaum playing the role of both moderator and provocateur. The show airs weekday afternoons throughout the year on SEC Network.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 10 Bulldogs face the Tigers for the 130th time. Georgia leads the Deep South's Oldest Rivalry 65-56-8 after collecting an eighth straight series victory in 2024. Gunner Stockton created three TDs when Georgia thumped Kentucky 35-14 on Oct. 4.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: The Garage Squad has never missed a reveal day, but this twin-turbo charged '72 Nova was one surprise problem after the next; it is seriously down to the wire on this one.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud
programme.desc: After Aaron bets Richard that the Monkeys would be able to finish building a 1980 El Camino one week ahead of schedule, last-minute problems threaten to push them past their deadline.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud
programme.desc: As Richard gets ready to gamble selling a million dollars worth of cars at Barrett-Jackson, last-minute problems with their '55 Chevy threaten to keep him from taking it to auction.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: This annual invite-only show in Rosemont, IL, is a show stopper, some of the best muscle cars and Corvettes are found at mcacn.

programme.title: Motorhead Garage
programme.desc: If it goes, Dave Dobson and the Motorhead Garage crew are fans. They bring you their love for all things motorized as they modify cars, trucks, ATVs and motorcycles using aftermarket equipment, ranging from the tried-and-true to the innovative and new.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Dave is excited to see a Model T roll into the Guild, and gets Ron on to fire up the engine; the team installs a new engine in a '67 Firebird.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Dave tasks new hire Jessica to figure out why the headlights on his Model A hot rod don't work; Brad installs a digital instrument panel in a restored C10; the '62 Rambler is off with Greg to Comic-Con to meet French Stewart.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Talon installs a serpentine kit on a '67 Firebird engine; a '74 Triumph is in for some TLC, but Ron hears a mysterious noise during the test drive; Barry paints a new steering wheel for a '53 Packard.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Jessica installs a new radio in the '53 Packard, while Ron investigates a weird sound coming from the new engine in a '68 Charger; Talon fits a custom-made driveshaft into the '67 Firebird.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: The owner of this Ram 2500 is looking to get his mobile mechanic business off the ground and he has asked for a little help; the guys outfit his truck with a safe place for his tools and everything he'll need to get the job done.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: As a how-to show dedicated exclusively to trucks, 4x4s and SUVs, Truck U finds monster-truck expert Matt Steele and master mechanic Bruno Massel involved in hands-on projects crucial to serious off-roading and truck performance.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: New kid Tommy has some major work on a '72 Alfa Romeo, and Dan and Kalev work patiently to get the '67 Firebird's vinyl roof perfect. Talon relocates the alternator on the '35 Plymouth, and Dave tests Tommy's work, joining Greg on the Alfa road test.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: The '67 Firebird is ready for fire-up and does not disappoint. Brad works on Dave's hot rod, while a '69 Charger gets some gap work before heading to the paint shop. Ron tasks Kalev with modifying the '35 Plymouth's headlights to fit a modern bulb.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The '92 Typhoon is back; rod knock will be a thing of the past as Alex and Lucky refresh the drivetrain and pit it head to head against today's top-of-the-line people-mover.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Last year's newly minted annual holiday, HRG Day, was a wild success for everyone but the Bonemaro, the Crown Hic and the Savoy; all three came home hurt, and Hot Rod detectives Alex and Lucky are on the case to find out why.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Alex and Lucky explore new territory in the world of land speed racing and continue down a well-worn path with the Bonemaro; more than the cars, this one is all about goals, setting personal targets and breaking personal bests.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: After years of living a polarizing existence with an electric motor, Alex and Lucky have been given the go-ahead to bring Project X back to its glory days as a gas-huffing machine; there's no better way than a simple 1,000-hp crate 632 from GM.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The team's long disappointed Grand National has finally earned its keep at Hot Rod Garage; with whiff after whiff at the dragstrip, the team has pulled out all the stops, called a few friends and finally got to the bottom of what's holding them back.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: "Roadkill Nights" is back, and so is the team's '55 Savoy; the team is in Pontiac, Mich. for all the street-legal drag racing action on Woodward in the Big Tire class; that means faster cars, better drivers and a need to step up the game.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Lucky Costa and Alex Taylor join forces to build hot rods in every shape imaginable; from the American RWD V-8s that would be expected to oddball and niche performers that wouldn't, they build them fast, build them cool and build them right.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The '32 Roadster land speed car is finally starting to take shape, and it's ready to take its maiden voyage down the dry lake bed of El Mirage; that is, of course, if the lake bed stays dry.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Alex and Lucky set out to answer if a dim-a-dozen Beetle can be called a hot rod as they take a well-worn Beetle and start it down the road to a Cal-look cruiser; they're cheap, easy to modify and have parts support galore.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: An all-wheel-drive sport truck should really have all of its wheels driving; that's the goal as Alex and Lucky upgrade a Typhoon trans and everything from the transfer case forward, bulletproofing parts until the next one fails.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Derek's Roadworthy Rescue'd Trans Am may have been destroyed before, but the crew is trying to make it right; enter 455 upgrades for power, a T-56 for shifts, and EFI for all of those hairpin turns.

programme.title: Exorcist: The Beginning
programme.desc: Father Merrin (Stellan Skarsgard) is haunted by his experiences in World War II, when occupying Nazi troops forced him to be complicit in their atrocities. In the aftermath, he has renounced his faith and begun working as an archaeologist. He travels to Kenya, where a fifth-century Byzantine church holds ancient relics. There he encounters Sarah (Izabella Scorupco), a doctor and concentration camp survivor. The strange occurrences that soon begin reunite him with the evil he sought to escape.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: Dr. Lynn Denlon (Bahar Soomekh) becomes a pawn in the Jigsaw Killer's (Tobin Bell) latest gory game. Kidnapped and taken to an abandoned warehouse, she finds Jigsaw bedridden and dying. Her task is to keep the maniac alive long enough for Jeff (Angus Macfadyen), a fellow victim, to complete his own task. Each is unaware that Jigsaw has much bigger -- and deadlier -- plans in store.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: On the hunt for the twisted vigilante and serial killer Jigsaw, Detective Eric Matthews and his team must apprehend the elusive murderer to rescue eight people trapped in an abandoned house, before they succumb to his torturous and murderous games. One twist to this task is that Matthews' own son, Daniel, is among the eight people Jigsaw has chosen to test for their lack of morality. With nerve gas pumping through the house, every second counts.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: After a virus turns most people into zombies, the world's surviving humans remain locked in an ongoing battle against the hungry undead. Four survivors -- Tallahassee (Woody Harrelson) and his cohorts Columbus (Jesse Eisenberg), Wichita (Emma Stone) and Little Rock (Abigail Breslin) -- abide by a list of survival rules and zombie-killing strategies as they make their way toward a rumored safe haven in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut
programme.desc: When their son Matt (Kyle Gallner) receives a diagnosis of cancer, Sara (Virginia Madsen) and Peter (Martin Donovan) Campbell move to Connecticut to be closer to his doctors. At first all is well, but then Matt becomes increasingly disturbed by what appears to be paranormal activity. Sara turns to a priest for help, and the ghosts are seemingly banished -- but Matt's condition takes a sudden and unexplained turn for the worse, and the lives of Sara and the rest of her family are endangered.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
programme.desc: A historic Southern home's new residents (Abigail Spencer, Chad Michael Murray) come face to face with a malevolent force.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Five medical students embark on a daring and dangerous experiment to gain insight into the mystery of what lies beyond the confines of life. The bold adventure begins when they trigger near-death experiences by stopping their hearts for short periods of time. As their trials become more perilous, each must confront the sins from their past while facing the paranormal consequences of journeying to the other side.

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre Part 2
programme.desc: Chainsaw-wielding maniac Leatherface (Bill Johnson) is up to his cannibalistic ways once again, along with the rest of his twisted clan, including the equally disturbed Chop-Top (Bill Moseley). This time, the masked killer has set his sights on pretty disc jockey Vanita "Stretch" Brock (Caroline Williams), who teams up with Texas lawman Lefty Enright (Dennis Hopper) to battle the psychopath and his family deep within their lair, a macabre abandoned amusement park.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw 3D
programme.desc: Decades ago, residents of Newt, Texas, long suspected that the Sawyer family was responsible for the disappearances of many people. When their suspicions finally were confirmed, vigilantes torched the Sawyer compound and killed every member of the family -- or so they thought. Much later, a young woman named Heather (Alexandra Daddario) learns that she has inherited Texas property from an unknown relative, and she is unaware of horrors that await in the mansion's dank cellar.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Reporter Angela (Jennifer Carpenter) and her cameraman Scott (Steve Harris) are doing a story on night-shift firefighters for a reality-TV program. A late-night distress call takes them to a Los Angeles apartment building, where the police are investigating a report of horrific screams. The TV team and emergency workers find an old woman, who suddenly attacks with teeth bared. What's more, Angela and company find that the building has been sealed by CDC workers. Then the attacks really begin.

programme.title: State of Consciousness
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man winds up in a shady mental facility where an experimental treatment causes a yearlong gap in his memory, leaving him unable to separate horrific hallucinations from real life. As he fights to regain the fragments of his old life, he starts to realize the truth is more frightening than anything he could ever imagine.

programme.title: Flatliners

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Unable to accept the fact that her daughter is dying, Rose (Radha Mitchell) decides to take the girl to a faith healer. On the way, the pair drive through a portal in reality, leading to an eerie town called Silent Hill. The town is surrounded by a potent darkness, and the human survivors fight a losing battle against it.

programme.title: The Rage: Carrie 2
programme.desc: When her closest friend commits suicide after being manipulated by the popular crowd, quiet and bookish Rachel Lang (Emily Bergl) decides to get back at the guilty parties. Although Rachel falls for sensitive football player Jesse Ryan (Jason London), she remains determined to punish his callous friends. When Rachel discovers that she has superhuman abilities, it ups the stakes for her revenge, echoing a supernatural incident that occurred decades before.
